name: Jewel Legends: Atlantis
description:
In the Match-3 game "Jewel Legends - Atlantis" you have to discover the secrets of Atlantis and repair the magnificent city! Build rows of three or more of the same symbol - you will have huge chains built before you know it! Collect ancient artifacts and secret treasures that you can use to build your city.

• Restore Atlantis to its former glory in this tile-matching adventure
• 140 levels and 8 bonus tools
• Build marvelous structures such as the Crystal Forge, the Mushroom Farm and the Tavern
• 3 game modes - Adventure, Tournament and Freeplay - plus Challenging Mini Games
